select m.head as head, m.nick_name as nickName, m.name as name, mcr.remind_time as remindTime, mcr.describes as describes, mcr.create_date as createDate from dj_member_customer_record mcr INNER JOIN dj_member m on m.id = mcr.member_id where mcr.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY mcr.create_date DESC

select m.name as name, m.head as head, ct.talk_content as describes, ct.create_date as createDate, ct.remind_time as remindTime from dj_user u INNER JOIN dj_member m on u.member_id=m.id INNER JOIN dj_clue_talk ct on ct.user_id=u.id where ct.clue_id= #{clueId} ORDER BY ct.create_date DESC

select m.name as name, m.mobile as mobile, m.head as head, cwt.type as type from dj_core_house_flow chf INNER JOIN dj_member m on chf.worker_id = m.id INNER JOIN dj_core_worker_type cwt on chf.worker_type_id = cwt.id where m.worker_type = 3 and chf.house_id = #{houseId} ORDER BY cwt.create_date DESC
